FirmwareProvisioning.description: Configuration data for platform firmware provisioning.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ProvisioningStatus.description: This indicates platform firmware provisioning state.
ProvisioningStatus.longDescription: The value of this property indicating provisioning status of platform firmware.

enumDescriptions.ProvisionedAndLocked: Platform firmware is provisioned and locked.
enumDescriptions.ProvisionedButNotLocked: Platform firmware is provisioned but not locked.

enumLongDescriptions.ProvisionedAndLocked: Platform firmware is provisioned and locked. So re-provisioning is not allowed in this state.
enumLongDescriptions.ProvisionedButNotLocked: Platform firmware is provisioned but not locked. So re-provisioning is allowed in this state.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LampTest.description: An indicator allowing an operator to run LED lamp test.
LampTest.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of lamp state function for this resource.

PartitionSystemAttentionIndicator.description: An indicator allowing an operator to operate partition system attention.
PartitionSystemAttentionIndicator.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of the partition system attention of this resource.

PlatformSystemAttentionIndicator.description: An indicator allowing an operator to operate platform system attention.
PlatformSystemAttentionIndicator.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of the platform system attention of this resource.

PCIeTopologyRefresh.description: An indication of topology information is ready.
PCIeTopologyRefresh.longDescription: This property when set to 'true' refreshes the topology information. The application which uses this should set it to 'false' when a refresh occurs.

SavePCIeTopologyInfo.description: An indication of PEL topology information is saved.
SavePCIeTopologyInfo.longDescription: This property when set to 'true' saves the topology information. The information is saved in the form of a PEL(Error Log).

EnabledPanelFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain the list of enabled panel functions.

ChapData.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe ChapData.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ChapName.description: A user selected name associated with each of the chap secret password.
ChapName.longDescription: This property shall contain ChapName that is a user selected name associated with each of the chap secret password.

ChapSecret.description: An encrypted secret password transferred to the Host for the respective ChapName.
ChapSecret.longDescription: This property shall contain ChapSecret that is an encrypted secret password transferred to the Host for the respective ChapName.

ExecutePanelFunction.description: This object executes a panel function

FuncNo.longDescription: This parameter shall contain a  panel function number to be executed.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #OemComputerSystem
